testcase.classname: Check motor vehicle stamp duty calculation
testcase.name: User verifies stamp duty calculation for a vehicle
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the Service NSW stamp duty page........................passed When the user clicks the Check online button................................passed Then the Revenue NSW calculator page should be displayed....................passed When the user selects Yes for passenger vehicle.............................passed And the user enters a purchase price of "45000".............................passed And the user clicks the Calculate button....................................passed Then the calculation popup should display correct information...............passed
